SEARCH

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
User
Customer
public class Customer extends User
Template class (extends User) for Customers. Stores elementary details about a Customer. Holds the same set of information in User.
instanceOf Customer is used to provide a Customer their customized permissions where required.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String customerString, boolean hasDetails)
      Parses a Customer object's String and converts it into a Customer object. Used while reading Customer(s) from memory. Inherently calls User(String userString, boolean hasDetails) to instantiate inherited fields to their values.

      Possible customerString values dependent on memory:
      hasDetails == false => User.toString()
      hasDetails == true => detailedToString()
      Parameters:
      customerString - A Customer String
      hasDetails - Whether the Customer String is detailed (i.e. it contains blocked user, invisible user, and censored words)
      See Also:
      • User.toString()
      • detailedToString()

    • Customer

      public Customer(String name, String email, String password)
      Creates a new Customer object with provided parameters. Inherently calls User(String name, String email, String password) Used when creating a new Customer account.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer
      email - The email of the customer
      password - The password of the customer

  • Method Details

    • detailedToString

      public String detailedToString()
      Generates a formatted String of the Customer containing all details.

      General format:
      Customer<username, email, password, this.getBlockedUsers(), this.getInvisibleUsers(), this.getCensoredWords()>
      Returns:
      Returns the Customer object's String

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generates a formatted String of the Customer as a User object String by inherently calling User.toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class User
      Returns:
      Returns the Customer object's User object String
